title: Break the game
body: I play every day, every day to play 8 have to lose 7, are teammates play bad, why your team system so unfair, how can my friend met a good teammate, but I do, 8 Always lose, you can win at least a few, I really do not know how to think, this game is breaking the game, today I challenge GM here, why so unfair, so go you want normal business, each time to play Teammates began to infinite head, how to play, the game company I fuck family！！！！！！！！！FU CK、 FUC K、 FU CK 、FU CK！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！@！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！！

replies.body: enough internet for today, time to sleep mate
